documents.document:
OCA Provides Introduction to Cartooning as a Preparatory Co

November 5, 2010 - Queensland, Australia – Online Courses Australia – the leader in providing nationally accredited short courses all across the continent, provided a distance learning program called Introduction to Cartooning as a preparatory course for Comic Strip for Beginners.

This distance learning course is part of the full coverage given by OCA’s electronic distance learning centre.

Through this, enrollees and the OCA tutors interacted with each other through the process of creating sequential art for commercial publishers, as well as manga, underground comics and the general comic art scene.

The interactive distance education course which carries everything from style, characters, scenarios and storytelling through lettering, inking, colouring and the publishing process has assisted students to learn how to professionalise their talents and turn their hobby into a career.

On the other hand, the Introduction to Cartooning online study at home program has 4 units of study: Tools of the Trade, Basic Training, Developing Ideas and Finishing Touches.

Furthermore, some of the career prospect directions for the distance education program can include Newspaper or Press Cartoonist, Children's Book Illustrator, Portraiture and Caricature, Greeting cards, Promotional Material, Comic Strips, Graphic Novels, Digital Comics and Motion Comics, Manga or Anime, and Animations for TV and Movies.

For inquiries, please call their Australian hotline at 1300 0 ONLINE (1300-0-665-463). For further details, visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/courses/creative-courses/introduction-to-cartooning.aspx

About Online Courses Australia

Online Courses Australia is a top provider of online courses based in Queensland. They are registered with the National Audit and Registration Agency (NARA) as a Registered Training Organisation (RTO – 32080). As an RTO, they operate under the Australian Quality Training Framework (AQTF). This means that they provide quality assured and nationally recognised courses. Their short courses have been independently evaluated by government, local government and industry representatives to guarantee that they meet the highest standards of distance learning excellence.

Enhance Your Photography Skills at OCA

Do you love photography but not your photos? Do you want to develop your photography skills but do not have the time to attend traditional photography class?

Then take an online photography course!

In just a few weeks of taking a study at home photography course, you can enhance your photography skills and take it into a whole new level. Moreover, you can even transform your long time hobby into a lifetime profitable profession!

And when it comes to finding the right online and distance learning provider, there is only one name that you can trust, Online Courses Australia (OCA).

OCA offers a wide range of nationally accredited short courses and diploma course including innovative, fun and interactive photography course. All of their online courses have been independently evaluated by industry experts and government representatives to ensure they meet the highest standards of course excellence. Thus, you can be sure that upon completion of the OCA photography course, you can confidently apply your new skill and knowledge set like a pro.

To help you select the best and suitable photography course to take, here are the four photography courses offered by OCA:

SLR Camera Course

If you are just starting out on taking photos, the SLR camera distance education course is perfect for you. Through the SLR Camera Course, you will be able to learn how to take contemporary family photos, black and white portraits, exciting landscape and fine arts photos as well as learn how to shoot fashion and products and do night photography.

Photoshop Techniques

This distance learning photography course will teach you how to use Photoshop techniques to digitally retouch your photos and images. You will also learn the advances of digital image manipulation to enhance and improve your photographs and be at par with the best photographer in town.

Advance Diploma and Diploma in Starting Your Own Photography Business

These Photography courses were designed for those who want to make their hobby into a profitable career. You will be provided with comprehensive and interactive modules packed with all the information you need to run a successful photography business.

So whatever photography course you want to study, OCA can help you achieve your photography goals.

Enroll now!

Call 1300 0 665463 or visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/courses/photography-courses.aspx

Get a Certificate in MYOB Training and Get a Job in Finance

Do you fancy a career in finance and need to learn Australia’s number one accounting software, MYOB?

Then get the necessary MYOB training at Online Courses Australia (OCA).

OCA is a nationally recognised training organization in Australia. They are renowned in providing nationally accredited short courses and study at home programs. Of which have been evaluated by industry and government representatives to ensure they meet the highest standards of online courses excellence.

With OCA’s MYOB Training, you will be able to acquire the skills and knowledge to help you get a bookkeeping job in one of Australia’s top businesses and accounting firms. OCA’s distance education modules are packed with the necessary topics designed to help you:

• Handle basic accounting and banking functions.
• Cover important areas such as sales recording, inventory management as well as reconciliation and payroll administration.
• Utilise tax and compliance systems to take care of GST and BAS requirements.
• Familiarize multi-faceted payroll systems to manage pay runs and entitlements.
• Manage company file accounts and back-up procedures.

The MYOB training is delivered 100% online. And upon completion of the course, you will receive an Online Courses Australia Certificate of Achievement in MYOB Introduction v.19

All OCA interactive online and short courses were developed exclusively for the virtual classroom by experts engaged in the latest distance education technologies. Student-instructor and student-student interactions are highly interactive and typically occur via online “discussion study forums.”

And because you chose to study at home, you have the freedom to finish the MYOB training at your own pace. You can also decide or choose your own schedule. You can take the course during your lunch break or after working hours!

So take this opportunity to gain MYOB training and get a job in finance that enhances your skills and rewards your experience.

Call 1300 665463 or visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/

OCA Online Courses: Far Better Than Physical Classrooms

After graduating from high school, it is time to decide what it is we want to do with the rest of our lives. For some, it is going to university, getting a degree and embarking on a professional career. However, going to university costs money, which is why many kids do not go straight to university after graduation.

There is another option available that allows you to get an education without having to sit in a classroom and sit out a strict schedule.

Study at home online courses is the ideal solution for those who simply cannot afford to do so. If you are working, you can continue to work but you also learn valuable skills that will help you in your job and allow you to advance professionally without having to go to daily classes.

When you take online courses, you have the advantage of not having to go to a physical classroom. You can study on your own time and schedule and learn at your own pace. The classes that are available for online courses also give you a much more practical advantage in the work place with the variety of classes that are available. You can choose diploma course programs, certificate programs such aviation courses, or take short courses for continuous online education.

Some students who choose to go to university and work at the same time have difficulty in juggling the time constraints that put additional stress on them and so rarely excel. Being physically present, taking tests and preparing for homework and assigned work due with stringent deadlines does not help when working either.

With OnlineCoursesAustralia distance learning and online short courses, these stresses are completely eliminated. You do not have to sacrifice your work schedule to accommodate a class schedule. Whenever you feel you are refreshed and ready to learn, you can log on to your class and learn the material. You can work on your assignments at your leisure and put forth the effort when you are motivated.

The biggest advantage to online courses is the knowledge retention. When you study comfortably you are more likely to retain what you learned. This can be a significant advantage over traditional studying.

To learn more about online courses for distance education, log on to http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/

Online Courses Australia Distance Learning Centre Offers MYO

November 17, 2010 – Samford, Queensland, Australia – Online Courses Australia – the most in demand distance learning centre has offered MYOB training for industry experts and accredited teachers to allow them to successfully manage their finances for any small to medium size business.

This industry leading MYOB (Mind Your Own Business) distance learning course has been designed to help people set up and use a set of accounts using MYOB for version 19 of Australia's number one accounting or bookkeeping software incorporated in day-to-day transactions.

Upon completion of the short courses , participants were able to navigate around MYOB, learn to make purchases from suppliers, pay for purchases made from suppliers, manage company file accounts and back-up procedures, deal with more complex invoicing matters as well as learn the basics in financial reporting.

Furthermore, the MYOB training has been delivered 100% online with a log-in and password issued to the enrollees, providing access to OCA's distance learning centre.

However, students were given the option to attend face to face workshops available Australia wide for an incredible price of $499.

On the other hand, for those who have successfully completed the MYOB training they were able to receive an Online Courses Australia Certificate of Achievement in MYOB Introduction v.19 as well as attained career and employment as bookkeepers for mostly small or medium sized businesses.

For inquiries on MYOB training, contact Online Courses Australia at 1300 0 665 463 or log on to http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/ for more details.

About Online Course Australia

Online Courses Australia is based in Queensland and is registered with the National Audit and Registration Agency (NARA) as a Registered Training Organisation. As an RTO, OCA operates under the Australian Quality Training Framework (AQTF). Thus, they provide quality assured and nationally recognised qualifications. Their online courses have been independently evaluated by government, local government and industry representatives to guarantee that they meet the highest standards of course excellence, complying with International Quality Assurance standards (ISO 9001: 2008).

Online Courses Australia Launches Two Professional Wedding P

November 17, 2010 – Samford, Queensland, Australia – Online Courses Australia – a highly recognized provider of online courses has launched two professional wedding planning courses that are appropriate for those who want to have a home-based bridal business.

For those who want to make money at home and have a desire for designing wedding celebrations, the wedding planning lessons are the most suitable short courses to take.

These bridal distance education and study at home courses comes in two different study units composed of 3-unit Plan Your Wedding and the 6-unit Professional Wedding Planning courses.

The Plan Your Wedding course was developed to provide guidance to students as they plan and prepare for basic wedding celebrations.

The professional wedding planning course outlined contained more detailed topics like ‘where to start’, ‘making decisions’, ‘ideas’, ‘hints and tips regarding intimate nuptials.’

Additionally, the wedding planning course is delivered 100% online. Upon enrolment students are issued with a log-in and password, providing access to OCA's distance learning centre.
Each unit of the said wedding planning course takes approximately 1 to 2 hours with a maximum of 3 months access to the online course.

The 6-unit Professional Wedding Planning course is a comprehensive one in which everything that the students need know to be successful in the field of wedding planning business is contained on a DVD kit provided.

Besides receiving the 6 DVD’s, enrollees will also receive a course manual and business steps, a resource disk plus 12 months of unlimited email support.

The 12 month unlimited email support gives students tutorial support regardless of when the course is finished.

In case they needed to ask some guidance on how to establish their wedding planning business, OCA instructors were always there to assist students.

The completion of the course has taken the enrollees 4 to 6 weeks with approximately 3 months access to the distance learning course. To inquire on wedding planning courses, contact 1300 0 665 463 or visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/

Online Courses Australia Wedding Planning Course

December 9, 2010 – Samford, Queensland, Australia – Online Courses Australia – one of the top government-accredited online academy on short courses in Australia has opened wedding planning course for brides-to-be.

Online Courses Australia has offered this wedding planning course to brides-to-be who want to save money in hiring professional wedding planners while not sacrificing careful planning for the their much-awaited day.

“Planning Your Wedding”, the title of the wedding planning course for brides-to-be, has been developed by Online Courses Australia to provide guidance as brides-to-be plan and prepare for their perfect day. With “Planning Your Wedding”, they can study at home and learn making wise choices from the who, what and why and when of venue and date setting, to tips on making all of wedding-related decisions that will make their wedding day successful and eventful. Delivered online, “Planning Your Wedding” is a 3-unit course that covers wedding planning topics like ‘Where should you start’, Wedding decisions and Ideas, hints and tips.

Brides-to-be can conveniently enroll as students online and upon enrolment, be given access to useful resources relating to wedding planning. At the same time, they can study interactive lessons that will not bore them. This short course takes 3 to 6 hours of study and is accessible to the students for up to 3 months. This gives an advantage to the students because they can complete the course online in the comfort of their homes at their own time.

Upon completion of this wedding planning course, students will receive an Online Courses Australia Certificate of Achievement in Planning Your Wedding. There are no pre-requisite to this course.

For more information, visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/

About Online Course Australia


Online Course Australia is a Queensland-based e-learning centre that is registered with the National Audit and Registration Agency (NARA) as a Registered Training Organisation(RTO). Its online courses have been independently evaluated by government, local government and industry representatives to guarantee that they meet the highest standards of course excellence.

Online Courses Australia Launches Online Marketing Courses

December 9, 2010 – Samford, Queensland, Australia – Online Courses Australia – the specialist e-learning centre that offers online courses in Australia has launched Online Marketing courses for beginners, intermediate and expert internet marketers.

Online Courses Australia has offered these Online Marketing courses to small business owners who are just starting their businesses on the Internet as well as to people who are planning to setup their business online but do not know how to start it out. Individuals who want to land a job in the Internet marketing industry can also enroll in these Online Marketing courses.

Online marketing courses being offered by Online Courses Australia are subdivided into 4 short courses : Introduction to Online Marketing, Kick Start Your Online Business which is for beginners, Online Marketing for Intermediate Level and Online Marketing and SEO which is for Advanced Level. These short courses are divided into several modules which contain DIY tips for a successful online business.

Enrollees to these courses are given helpful and useful online resources. The lessons are developed exclusively for the virtual classroom which attunes to the latest technology in distance education. These short courses are accessible to students up to 3 months. Therefore, they can complete the course online in the comfort of their homes at their own time.

Upon completion of one course, students will receive Certificates of Achievement from Online Courses Australia. There is no pre-requisite for each course. However, it is recommended that students enroll in the Introduction first for better understanding of the succeeding lessons.

For more information, visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/

About Online Course Australia

Online Course Australia is a government-accredited online training centre that offers short courses in different disciplines. Based in Queensland, Online Course Australia engages in interactive learning activities that will prepare students for the workforce, career development opportunities and university.

OCA Online Marketing Courses for SEO Marketing Strategies

December 09, 2010 – Samford, QLD., Australia – Online Courses Australia (OCA) – has offered the online marketing courses for SEO marketing strategies to get ahead with the online business.

For people who were confused and did not know how get started online or wanted to have more visitors visiting their business sites, and have more sales and ROI, relax! No need to worry because they have come to the right site. OCA‘s industry leading marketing online courses will give them the right skills to succeed. Their expert online marketing tutors have experienced it all. OCA has the knowledge and they are willing to share it!

Students can even study at home for the online marketing courses!

OCA has online marketing courses can also be like: Introduction to online marketing that ensures the business, product or service is maximizing the potential of the internet. It is a good starting point for marketers who are looking ways to expand their career or move into a different sphere.

Then they have Kick start your online business for beginners. OCA will teach students how to set up a professional e-commerce website step-by-step. They will teach participants hot to get targeted traffic that build the business and how to get big audience without spending any money on advertisements, find out how to create digital products to sell, and how to set up payment buttons.

OCA also have online marketing course for intermediate. It teaches extensive and comprehensive web marketing modules designed to generate as many qualified sales leads as possible and by improving website visibility in the organic search engine results (SERPS). This course does not teach students how to make a website.

Upon successful completion of this course students will receive a Certificate of Achievement in Online Marketing. For more details call 1300-665-463 or visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/courses/online-marketing-courses.asp x

Online Courses Australia DVD-based Wedding Planning Course

January 6, 2011 – Samford, Queensland, Australia – Online Courses Australia – one of the leading government-accredited distance education centres in Australia has partnered with Courses for Success to create DVD-based wedding planning course.

This collaboration of the two reputed short courses centres in Australia has produced the best home-based Wedding Planning guide which is presented on DVD named “How to Start Making Money from Wedding Planning .”

This DVD course can give students all the inside tips to running a profitable wedding planning business. The course is loaded with all the valuable information to help students become successful wedding planners.

This Wedding planning course can provide aspiring wedding planners a much more money-saving way of achieving their dream job with the same quality learning that they can receive from conventional methods of education. With this DVD-based course, they can study at home and learn the skills necessary to become professional wedding planners all at their own convenient time and pace.

Wedding planning DVD course produced by Online Courses Australia and Courses for Success is comprehensive. Everything needed to known by students is contained in the DVD and if there is anything that students are not sure about they can send queries to Online Courses Australia and they will respond promptly.

The course is presented in professional manner by a government accredited trainer and is developed by a government-accredited qualified trainer with years of wedding planning experience.

When students finish taking up the course, they will be issued with an Online Courses Australia Certificate in Wedding Planning as the first step in their wedding planning career.

When they become professional wedding planners, they can enjoy a glamorous lifestyle with big pay. They can help couples shop for the right wedding dresses, visit venues, choose flowers, organise catering and other stuff that will surely delight them.

They can start it now with the wedding planning course from Online Courses Australia.
For more information, call 1300 0 665 463 or visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/

OCA offers Practical Study at Home Wedding Planning Courses

January 6, 2011 – Samford, Queensland, Australia – leading distance education provider – Online Courses Australia (OCA) – has offered practical wedding planning courses to help aspiring wedding planners land their dream job in the wedding planning industry.

“Our wedding planning courses will help you learn all the skills and tricks required for you to succeed,” said OCA.

Each of these wedding planning courses has been designed by professionals and experts from the wedding planning industry, with REAL experience.

“You will get a true insider’s viewpoint of what a wedding planner should and need to do.”
Thus, OCA offers these two wedding planning short courses:

Study at Home “Plan Your Wedding” Short Course

This will help brides to take full control of the most momentous event of their lives. The “Plan Your Wedding” course will give them the basic know-how of planning a wedding. From the who, what, where, why and when as well as to venue booking and date setting to tips on making all the essential decisions necessary to have a fairy tale-like wedding.

Professional Wedding Planning Course

OCA has created the best study at home wedding planner business start up guide which is presented on DVD called “How to Make Money from Wedding Planning.” This wedding planning DVD course gives learners all the inside tips to running a profitable wedding planning business.

Moreover, these wedding planning courses are exclusive to OCA. And they are the most affordable and interactive distance learning in the online or distance education industry.

To know more of these courses, call 1300 0665 463 or visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/ for more information

About Online Courses Australia

Online Courses Australia (OCA) is a nationally registered training organization which specializes in creating and providing dynamic online training courses for individuals, Australia-wide. At OCA, online learners will achieve a qualification, land their dream job or simply develop their skills to enhance their career possibilities and knowledge, all in the comfort of their own home or work environment.

OCA Offers Online MYOB Training Courses

January 6, 2011 – Samford, QLD., Australia – Online Courses Australia (OCA) – has offered online MYOB training courses ideal for those who are in the accounting/bookkeeping industry.

Online Courses Australia or OCA helped students how to use the number one accounting software in Australia called the MYOB. They will give students the MYOB training needed to be able to make and pay purchases, deal with complex invoicing matters, work with inventory on a day-to-day basis, perform bank and more with their MYOB courses which can be completed via interactive e-learning.

OCA short courses for MYOB have been developed by industry experts and accredited teachers to help students successfully manage the finances for any small to medium size business. With their series of easy- to-follow lessons, students will learn how to handle basic accounting and banking functions. They will learn from their MYOB training how to utilize tax and compliance systems to take care of GST and BAS requirements and multi-faceted payroll systems to manage runs and entitlements.

In MYOB training courses, students will learn how to use the software for sales, purchases, banking and bank reconciliation, managing company file accounts and back-up procedures, and the basic financial reporting. These MYOB training courses are delivered 100% online with the option to attend actual workshops that are available in Australia.

Upon enrollment, students are issued with a log-in and password, providing access to OCA’s e-learning centre.

One of the short courses for MYOB training is known as the MYOB basics for version 19. The industry leading MYOB course has been designed to help set up and use a set of accounts using MYOB for day-to-day transactions. This course is intended for students who wanted to learn the MYOB basics version 19 software.

Learn how to use Australia’s number one accounting/bookkeeping software now! Call 1300-665-463 or log on to http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/courses/myob-courses.aspx

Online Courses Australia Offers Online Marketing Program for

January 5, 2011 – Samford, Queensland, Australia – one of the top performing distance learning centres in Australia - Online Courses Australia – has offered online marketing program for beginners.

As an introduction to the four short courses , this online marketing course being offered by Online Courses Australia can teach beginners step-by-step how to setup a professional e-commerce website that can be operated from anywhere.

Named as “Kick Start Your Online Business – Beginners”, this online marketing program is not just about building a website, it is about building a business.

Students who can study at home for this course will find out that only minimal investments are needed in order to start an online business compared to traditional businesses.

Through this distance education program, beginners who want to start an online business yet do not have sufficient knowledge to succeed will learn the basics of the trade. Techniques on reaching to a huge audience without spending any money in advertising will be taught to them as well as creating digital products such as e-books and setup of payment buttons.

Best of all, this online marketing course will teach them how to put their online businesses on auto-pilot. They will learn ways to get their websites listed in Google within 48 hours instead of months and to have their websites visible on the Internet.

It is also perfect for people who want to begin an Internet marketing career. Career prospects for online marketing are online advertising, search engine optimiser, media marketing officer, web copywriter, web designer and many more. Passing this course and subsequent courses is just a step away to high-paying jobs.

Delivered 100% online, “Kick Start Your Online Business – Beginners” is loaded with interactive lessons, online quizzes and online discussions that will make this course a wonderful experience for beginners.

For more information, call 1300 0 665 463 or visit http://www.onlinecoursesaustralia.edu.au/
